argument.name: UXJavascriptChart
argument.description: The name (i.e. Chart id) of the Javascript chart you want to resize. You can enter a comma delimited list of Chart names. If you specify multiple Charts, each of which is based on one or more Data Series, a single Ajax callback is made to refresh all of the Charts.

page.description: Refreshes the data in Data Series that the Chart uses and then redraws the Chart.
page.discussion: An Ajax callback is made to the server to refresh the Data Series and then the Chart is redrawn using the new data. If the Chart is not based on any Data Series, then no Ajax callback is necessary and the Chart is redrawn.
